comments.body: So you added an extra maintainer. Very good :+1:
Yep, didn't know `author` could be a list. We're the team that is maintaining the original [oneview-ansible](https://github.com/HewlettPackard/oneview-ansible), so it makes sense to add him as well.

The more the merrier. Take that literally, because if you have 2 maintainers adding 'shipit' to a PR, the PR is automatically merged. That means you need at least three maintainers if one of the maintainer creates a PR.

Interesting, adding the PO of the project so we reach the 3-person mark then. 
Thanks :octocat:

Hey, it is expected that the 2 maintainers doing the shipit are actually reviewing the code and are being a PITA during review just like me. If this is about doing favors, it's not going to help the cause :-)
Sure, the PO will be reviewing as well and we do weekly demos for functionality :octocat:  Just won't be actively committing code

diffHunk:

    - Thiago Miotto (@tmiotto)
    - Adriane Cardozo (@adriane-cardozo)
options:

comments.body: There is an indentation issue here. I don't know if the documentation is allowed to be a nested list...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@        description:
            - Indicates the desired state for the Ethernet Network resource.
                - C(present) will ensure data properties are compliant with OneView.
                - C(absent) will remove the resource from OneView, if it exists.
                - C(default_bandwidth_reset) will reset the network connection template to the default.
